long_description: The REI InCamp 4 footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear. It is sized a bit smaller than the tent floor to prevent water from pooling underneath the tent during rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: The REI InCamp 4 footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear.
